entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 40S AFTER MIDNIGHT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
